author: Special Correspondent
text:
To celebrate International Women’s Day which falls on March 8, Motherhood, a birthing centre is organising free gynaecological consultations for all first-time mothers.

An ultrasound early pregnancy scan can be availed free at the centre from March 1 to 8, between 10 a.m. and 1 p.m. with prior appointment, a press release said.

For details, call 49154444 or 9566143803.
title: Avail free gynaecological consultations
